entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
